user: Follow the instructions below to accomplish the following task.

Task: Write a bio for the contractor using complete sentences.

Instructions: Use only the text below as a knowledge base. The response should be factual and only use facts present in the contractor text below.

contractor text:
Use this text to write a bio for the contractor.
uction com.   Housing Renovation | Multi Based Construction | Kentwood, MI             616.698.0880 info@rohdeconstruction.com    About Personnel Careers Services Portfolio Multi-family Construction Retail & Commercial Housing Renovation Historic Restoration Adaptive Reuse Hotels Senior/Assisted Living Student Housing Plan Room Contact  Select Page About Personnel Careers Services Portfolio Multi-family Construction Retail & Commercial Housing Renovation Historic Restoration Adaptive Reuse Hotels Senior/Assisted Living Student Housing Plan Room Contact                 PreviousNext123456  X  We Are Hiring! Rohde is looking for quality candidates to fill several positions.Click the â€œapplyâ€ button to see all of our available opportunities. Apply Today   îˆ  WEâ€™VE BEEN Building THE MIDWEST SINCE 1993 Â  Rohde Construction is a West Michigan-based general contractor with over 25 years of experience constructing projects throughout the Midwest. We specialize in all aspects of new Multi-family construction.     Learn More  CONSTRUCTION PORTFOLIO  Please take a minute to view a small sample of the hundreds of projects we have completed.
assistant: Rohde Construction is a general contractor based in Kentwood, Michigan, with over 25 years of experience constructing projects throughout the Midwest. The company specializes in all aspects of new Multi-family construction, and has completed hundreds of projects over the years. They are known for their expertise in housing renovation, historic restoration, adaptive reuse, and senior/assisted living facilities. Rohde Construction is committed to delivering high-quality construction services to their clients, and they have built a reputation for excellence in the industry. Their experienced team of professionals works closely with clients to ensure that their projects are completed on time, within budget, and to the highest standards of quality. If you are interested in joining the Rohde Construction team, they are always looking for quality candidates to fill several positions. Visit their website or contact them at 616.698.0880 for more information.
